title: Hour 2:: Judge-ment Day
description:
Chris "Mad Dog" Russo says Judge will, "absolutely be a Yankee next season!" Stephen A. is not so sure. Marcus Spears says Patrick Mahomes is on track to win his 2nd MVP, but Kimberley Martin likes another AFC QB to take that honor. Plus, Mad Dog gives his top 3 reasons he's mad in the world of sports. Later Stephen A. calls the Saint the biggest disappointment in the NFL this season. Last, Mad Dog gives out his top underdogs for the weekend/

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
